summary.what: Added timbers amend command to modify existing ledger entries
summary.why: Users needed ability to fix typos, add missing context, or update summary fields in existing entries without recreating them
summary.how: Implemented new amend subcommand with --what/--why/--how/--tag flags for partial updates, --dry-run for preview, full JSON support, and comprehensive test coverage. Command uses storage.WriteEntry with force=true to overwrite git notes and updates the updated_at timestamp.
